entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Burns Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:25 a.m. PDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
